Articles.Content:
Soooo, I've started doing some colour studies of KSP. They're not defined-out much (just colour sketches, as you can see), just to get a "feel" of a location/planet/desaster. (click the links for embiggenments)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I'll add to this list as things accrue but since I'm only working on such things in my free time - of which there is little - it might be a while. Might eventually be merged into one big collage/colour banner that shows KSP in it's entirety?

In any case, thanks for having a look. Maybe someone likes colours as much as I do.

Edited January 8, 2014 by niv
replace dropbox links with imgur album
I like it! I would tone down the purple on kerbol a little though.

I like colors!

p.s. Is that a hand flying away in the Kerbol picture?
Holy cow!, they look amazing! nice work!
